# List of international presidential trips made by Mohammad Abdul Hamid

The following is a list of international presidential trips made by Mohammad Abdul Hamid while he served as the president of Bangladesh.
List of visits
{| class="wikitable outercollapse sortable" style="margin: 1em auto 1em auto"
|-
! style="width: 3%;"|
! width=150|Country
! width=120|Areas visited
! width=100|Date(s)
! width=180|Purpose(s)
! width=180|Ref.
|-
|
|
| New Delhi
| 18–23 December 2014
|
|
|-
|
|
| Dushanbe
| 13–15 June 2019
| To attend 5th Summit of Conference on Interaction and Confidence-Building Measures in Asia (CICA).
|
|-
|
|
| Bukhara
| 16 June 2019
|
|
|}
